name: Imprisoned Mythos
description: Epic chronicles, romantic legends, and the countless ages that gave them meaning. From these emerged all spiritual beliefs. It is no longer a prisoner, it shall die in the funeral of Gnosis, leaving behind an iron-cast tombstone.

skills.name: Induce Frenzy
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one target and delays their action.

skills.name: Blasphemous Curse
skills.description: Lock on to 1 ally target, enter "Deliverance of Relief" state, Anti-Creator will use "Mire Not Within Caves" on next action.

skills.name: Echoes of Tragedy
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to one target and delays their action.

skills.name: Eternal Misfortune Inflamed
skills.description: Locks on 2 targets to enter "Deliverance of Relief" state. "Anti-Creator" will use "The Spirit's Prison Shall Burn" on next action.

skills.name: Eternal Recurrence
skills.description: When this unit enters the "Grave Wound" state, restore all HP and dispel the "Grave Wound" state on next action.

skills.name: Immortal
skills.description: Immune to the effects of action bar changes, except "Anti-Creator." "Mythos" cannot be eliminated. When receiving a killing blow, it enters the "Grave Wound" state, causing all targets' actions to advance and dispelling the "<u>Action Lock</u>" state.
